skills.Name: Agile Body
skills.Description: Training has developed a quick and nimble fighting style, preferring to wear light armor.

skills.Name: Bow Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 4.5 when using a bow.

skills.Name: Dagger Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 3.6 when using a dagger.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 5.3 and Evasion by 3, and decreases the chance of receiving Critical Damage by 15% when equipped with light armor.

skills.Name: Long Shot
skills.Description: Increases the bow's range by 200.

skills.Name: Boost Breath
skills.Description: Increases lung capacity by 180.

skills.Name: Soul Arrow
skills.Description: Shoots an arrow that is aimed at a vital spot. Attacks the enemy with 280 Power added to P. Atk. Requires a bow. Over-hit and Critical are possible.

skills.Name: Deadly Blow
skills.Description: Attacks the target's vital points with 185 Physical Damage. Requires a dagger. Over-hit. Regains Mana..
